overview: Rob Seaver brings extensive experience in communications and online services to Vivox. Before joining industry pioneer, Jeff Pulver, in launching Vivox, Seaver was head of strategy, CFO, and a member of the management board of Einsteinet AG. While at Einsteinet AG, Seaver helped build the company from start-up to Euro 65 million in revenue and 440 employees. As managing director of Madrid-based Jazzya Investments, he planned and executed the launch of new communication and media ventures. Prior to that, he held positions in investment banking at Goldman Sachs International and as an attorney with Sullivan & Cromwell in London. Seaver holds a JD from the University of California, Berkeley and an AB degree from Harvard College.
